S.FORM: Derrick Alston sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1972, ryax sa tay 20 nqu tay 8, Derrick Alston, squliq na p'unro. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

Derrick Alston sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, wal malaxmisoq qaniy la. kawas tay 1972, ryax sa tay 20 nqo tay 8, Derrick Alston, sqoliq na p'onro. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
